:py:mod:`pv_evaluation.metrics.utils`
=====================================

.. py:module:: pv_evaluation.metrics.utils


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   pv_evaluation.metrics.utils.validate_membership



.. py:function:: validate_membership(membership_vect)

   Validate membership vector

   Membership vector should be a pandas Series with no NA values and no duplicated index values.
